items.name: polar-sponsorship
items.title: Polar Sponsorship Suite
items.description: Complete sponsorship integration with Polar.sh - sponsorship tiers, checkout flow, and API integration
items.docs: Complete Polar.sh sponsorship suite with tiers, checkout, and sponsor display. Set up products in Polar dashboard, update POLAR_PRODUCT_IDS in lib/polar.ts with your product IDs, and configure environment variables. Includes API routes, sponsor components, and checkout integration.

items.name: uploadthing-dropzone
items.title: UploadThing Dropzone
items.description: Complete file upload solution with drag & drop interface, progress tracking, and cloud storage integration
items.docs: Complete UploadThing file upload suite with drag & drop dropzone interface, progress tracking, and file management. Includes multiple file route configurations (image, PDF, media, general files) with built-in validation, error handling, and analytics tracking. Requires UploadThing account and API token.

items.name: uploadthing-button
items.title: UploadThing Button
items.description: Simple upload button with UploadThing integration
items.docs: Simple upload button component using UploadThing for basic file uploads with analytics tracking and error handling. Requires UploadThing account and API token.

items.name: theme-switcher
items.title: Theme Switcher
items.description: A theme switcher component with animated sun/moon icons
items.docs: ⚠️ Requires ThemeProvider setup! Wrap your app with <ThemeProvider> and add suppressHydrationWarning to <html>. Switch-based theme switcher with animated icons.

items.name: theme-switcher-switch
items.title: Theme Switcher Switch
items.description: Switch-based theme switcher with animated sun/moon icons
items.docs: ⚠️ Requires ThemeProvider setup! Wrap your app with <ThemeProvider> and add suppressHydrationWarning to <html>. Switch-based theme switcher with animated icons.

items.name: theme-switcher-button
items.title: Theme Switcher Button
items.description: Button-based theme switcher with rotating icons
items.docs: ⚠️ Requires ThemeProvider setup! Wrap your app with <ThemeProvider> and add suppressHydrationWarning to <html>. Button-based theme switcher with rotating icons.

items.name: theme-switcher-dropdown
items.title: Theme Switcher Dropdown
items.description: Dropdown theme switcher with system/light/dark options
items.docs: ⚠️ Requires ThemeProvider setup! Wrap your app with <ThemeProvider> and add suppressHydrationWarning to <html>. Dropdown with light/dark/system options.

items.name: theme-switcher-toggle
items.title: Theme Switcher Toggle
items.description: Custom toggle theme switcher with sliding animation
items.docs: ⚠️ Requires ThemeProvider setup! Wrap your app with <ThemeProvider> and add suppressHydrationWarning to <html>. Custom toggle with sliding animation.

items.name: theme-switcher-multi-button
items.title: Theme Switcher Multi Button
items.description: Multi-button theme switcher with system/light/dark options
items.docs: ⚠️ Requires ThemeProvider setup! Wrap your app with <ThemeProvider> and add suppressHydrationWarning to <html>. Multi-button with system/light/dark options.

items.name: clerk-waitlist-shadcn
items.title: Clerk Waitlist (ShadCN)
items.description: An animated waitlist signup form with Clerk integration using custom ShadCN components
items.docs: Animated waitlist signup form with Clerk integration using custom ShadCN components. Requires ClerkProvider in root layout and waitlist mode enabled in Clerk dashboard (Configure > Restrictions > Sign-up mode).

items.name: clerk-sign-in-shadcn
items.title: Clerk Sign In (ShadCN)
items.description: Complete sign-in form with Clerk integration using custom ShadCN components
items.docs: Complete sign-in form with OAuth providers, MFA support, and error handling using custom ShadCN components. Requires ClerkProvider in root layout.

items.name: clerk-sign-up-shadcn
items.title: Clerk Sign Up (ShadCN)
items.description: Complete sign-up form with Clerk integration and CAPTCHA support using custom ShadCN components
items.docs: Complete sign-up form with OAuth providers, email verification, and CAPTCHA support using custom ShadCN components. Requires ClerkProvider in root layout.

items.name: clerk-waitlist
items.title: Clerk Waitlist
items.description: Waitlist signup using Clerk's built-in components
items.docs: Waitlist signup using Clerk's built-in components. Requires ClerkProvider in root layout and waitlist mode enabled in Clerk dashboard (Configure > Restrictions > Sign-up mode).

items.name: clerk-sign-in
items.title: Clerk Sign In
items.description: Sign-in page using Clerk's built-in SignIn component
items.docs: Sign-in page using Clerk's built-in SignIn component. Requires ClerkProvider in root layout.

items.name: clerk-sign-up
items.title: Clerk Sign Up
items.description: Sign-up page using Clerk's built-in SignUp component
items.docs: Sign-up page using Clerk's built-in SignUp component. Requires ClerkProvider in root layout.

items.name: clerk-sign-in-signals
items.title: Clerk Sign In (Signals)
items.description: Advanced sign-in form using Clerk's experimental Signals API with password reset functionality
items.docs: ⚠️ Experimental: Advanced sign-in form using Clerk's experimental Signals API (@clerk/clerk-react@5.44.0+). Features password reset flow, real-time validation, and enhanced error handling. Requires ClerkProvider in root layout.

items.name: clerk-sign-up-signals
items.title: Clerk Sign Up (Signals)
items.description: Advanced sign-up form using Clerk's experimental Signals API with email verification
items.docs: ⚠️ Experimental: Advanced sign-up form using Clerk's experimental Signals API (@clerk/clerk-react@5.44.0+). Features automatic email verification, CAPTCHA support, and real-time validation. Requires ClerkProvider in root layout.

items.name: clerk-auth-shadcn
items.title: Clerk Auth Suite (ShadCN)
items.description: Complete Clerk authentication suite with sign-in, sign-up, waitlist, and middleware using custom ShadCN components
items.docs: Complete Clerk authentication bundle with custom ShadCN components: sign-in, sign-up, waitlist components, and middleware. Requires ClerkProvider in root layout.

items.name: clerk-auth-signals
items.title: Clerk Auth Suite (Signals)
items.description: Complete Clerk authentication suite using experimental Signals API with advanced authentication flows
items.docs: ⚠️ Experimental: Complete Clerk authentication bundle using Clerk's experimental Signals API (@clerk/clerk-react@5.44.0+). Includes advanced sign-in with password reset, sign-up with email verification, and middleware for route protection. Features real-time validation, enhanced error handling, and CAPTCHA support.

items.name: clerk-auth
items.title: Clerk Auth Suite
items.description: Complete Clerk authentication suite using Clerk's built-in components
items.docs: Complete Clerk authentication bundle using built-in Clerk components: sign-in, sign-up, waitlist components, and middleware. Requires ClerkProvider in root layout.

items.name: clerk-middleware
items.title: Clerk Middleware
items.description: Clerk middleware for Next.js App Router with route protection
items.docs: Clerk middleware for Next.js App Router with route protection. Install in project root as middleware.ts.
